definitions.definition: An electronic device or software that alters the sound of an instrument by combining out-of-phase copies of its original sound.
A mechanical device used to remove ice and snow from railway lines .

main_definition: ( music ) An electronic device or software that alters the sound of an instrument by combining out-of-phase copies of its original sound.
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A mechanical device used to remove ice and snow from railway lines .
